data.Name: Skip Marley
data.Bio: Skip Marley is a Jamaican singer-songwriter. He is the son of Cedella Marley, and maternal grandson of Bob Marley. Marley was born in Kingston, Jamaica to Cedella Marley and David Minto, and raised in Miami, Florida.[1][2] Growing up, he taught himself to play the piano, drums, guitar, and bass.[3] In 2015, he released his first single, "Cry to Me", and a second single called "Life" under the Tuff Gong label. He later signed with Blue Mountain Music, and joined his uncles Damian and Stephen on their Catch a Fire tour. Read more on Last.fm
